title: Welcome to North bank Waterfront Townhomes
description:
Welcome to North bank Waterfront Townhomes located right along the Delaware River bank! Located in close proximity to all of the amazing restaurants and boutiques in Fishtown and Northern Liberties. With all the features and amenities your modern lifestyle craves, Northbank is the neighborhood you can’t wait to call home. Step in and experience welcoming living areas that include luxurious chef’s kitchens and private rooftops — spaces where you can create memorable moments with friends, or family. 3203 Parkview Walk is a magnificent 4-bedroom 5-baths (3-full and 2 half) 3844 sq. ft. townhome! It features an open, spacious floorplan, 500 sq. ft. rooftop terrace, and a beautiful gourmet chef’s kitchen that is perfect for entertaining! Converted to condominiums in 2008, each residence features high-end finishes including wood flooring of varying shades; a gourmet kitchen with wood cabinetry, tile backsplash, granite countertops, and breakfast bar, GE Profile stainless steel appliances including a gas range; Kohler bathroom fixtures, and in-residence Bosch front-loading washer and dryer.
